text: @PressSec Don’t you think the GOP should have some more rallies? Maybe the GOP can find a city that will host an indoor convention for the GOP?  Then all of GOP can give honor Herman Cain in person. #TraitorInChief #COVID19 #GestapoTrump #GOPCorruptionOverCountry #JoeBidenForPresident2020
